column4: can anyone please tell me how to restart nm-applet in intrepid, i've been goolging for ages and cannot find anything, thanks

nope still get network manager is not connected and this on the console: ** (nm-applet:17742): WARNING **: nm_client_get_devices: error getting devices: The name org.freedesktop.NetworkManager was not provided by any .service files

and its to find out if that error is even related to network manager running or not
shouldn't i be doing it with dbus>?
